reviewText: Not happy bought season 1 threw 4 for my daughter for Christmas . It never said the dvd were from another region she went out and bought a smart DVD player and it still won't play . This is bull crap so anyone ordering from a third party from amazon please be careful. Waste of money.
This was purchased for a Christmas gift, and the recipient was so happy with it!  The price was great and the extras are really interesting.
